```{r,message=F,warning=F,eval=F}
                        #Dimensión salud con variables estandarizadas
                        
                        health_status_dim_3      = scale.default(pr_diab),

                        health_performance_dim_3 = scale.default(med_x_100),
                        health_performance_dim_4 = scale.default(enf_x_100),
                        health_performance_dim_5 = scale.default(far_x_100)
                        )

####################################################

```


# 4. Principal components analysis

```{r,message=F,warning=F}

# variables , componentes , dimensiones 

dynamic.population.pca        <- prcomp(social.dets     %>% 
                                 select(pr_edu_oth_distr,pr_wrk_oth_distr,
                                 pr_liv_oth_distr), center = TRUE,scale. = TRUE) 

economic.pca                  <- prcomp(social.dets     %>% 
                                 select(pr_insu, pr_pov_2018, pr_no_trabajo_pago), center = TRUE,scale. = TRUE) 

health.status.pca             <- prcomp(social.dets.dep %>% 
                                   select(pr_diab, pr_obes, pr_tos), center = TRUE,scale. = TRUE)

health.performance.pca        <- prcomp(social.dets.dep %>% 
                                 select(med_x_100, far_x_100,
                                 enf_x_100), center = TRUE,scale. = TRUE)

house.characteristics.pca      <- prcomp(social.dets     %>% 
                                  select(INEI_prop_No_techo_concreto, INEI_prop_Nopared_ladrillo_cemento,   
                                         INEI_prop_Nopiso_cemento_loseta), center = TRUE,scale. = TRUE)

```



# 5. Number of dimensions

## 1) Population's dynamic

```{r,eval=F,message=F,warning=F}
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)

(VE <- dynamic.population.pca$sdev^2)
PVE <- VE / sum(VE)
round(PVE, 2)


PVEplot  <-  qplot(c(1:3), PVE) + 
             geom_line() + 
             xlab("Principal Component") + 
             ylab("PVE") +
             ggtitle("Scree Plot") +
             ylim(0, 1)

# Cumulative PVE plot
cumPVE   <- qplot(c(1:3), cumsum(PVE))       + 
            geom_line()                      + 
            xlab("Principal Component")      + 
            ylab(NULL)                       + 
            ggtitle("Cumulative Scree Plot") +
            ylim(0,1)

grid.arrange(PVEplot, cumPVE, ncol = 2)

```

#8. Final database of determinants 

```{r,message=F,warning=F,echo=F}

# Componentes n =196 

dynamic_pop_dim_1        <-  dynamic.population.pca$x %>% 
                             as.data.frame() %>% 
                             select(PC1) %>% 
                             dplyr::rename(dynamic_pop_dim_1  = PC1)

econ_dim_1               <-  economic.pca$x %>% 
                             as.data.frame() %>% 
                             select(PC1) %>% 
                             dplyr::rename(econ_dim_1  = PC1)

house_charact_dim_1      <-  house.characteristics.pca$x %>% 
                             as.data.frame() %>% 
                             select(PC1) %>% 
                             dplyr::rename(house_charact_dim_1 = PC1)

health_status_dim_1      <-  health.status.pca$x %>% 
                             as.data.frame() %>% 
                             select(PC1)  %>% 
                             dplyr::rename(health_status_dim_1 = PC1)

health_performance_dim_1  <-  health.performance.pca$x %>% 
                              as.data.frame() %>% 
                              select(PC1)  %>% 
                              dplyr::rename(health_performance_dim_1 = PC1)


social.dets.pca <- left_join( cbind(social.dets, dynamic_pop_dim_1, econ_dim_1, house_charact_dim_1) ,
                              cbind(health_status_dim_1, health_performance_dim_1, 
                                    social.dets.dep %>%  dplyr::select(dep, health_status_dim_3, health_status_dim_4, health_status_dim_5, 
                                                                            health_performance_dim_3, health_performance_dim_4, health_performance_dim_5) ) ,
                              by = c("dep" = "dep") ) %>% 
                   dplyr::select(dep, prov, 
                                 educ_dim, demog_dim, 
                                 dynamic_pop_dim_1, 
                                 econ_dim_1, econ_dim_3, econ_dim_4, econ_dim_5,
                                 house_charact_dim_1,
                                 health_status_dim_1, health_status_dim_3, health_status_dim_4, health_status_dim_5,
                                 health_performance_dim_1, health_performance_dim_3, health_performance_dim_4, health_performance_dim_5)
                            

saveRDS(social.dets.pca, file.path(output, "social_dets_pca.rds"))
```
